basics.name: YOUR NAME
basics.summary: Motivated professional seeking to apply AI/ML skills in dynamic environments, contributing to organizational success and continuous personal growth.

quick_stats.text: 4+ major projects: CV, NLP, Time Series, DataViz

experience.title: Machine Learning — Internship
highlights: Built prototype using available AI tools, frameworks, and open datasets.
Trained/tested models to identify parameters: count, estimated age, gender, attention span.
Integrated model into the Bharat TeleClinic Android environment under guidance.
Collaborated with senior developers; incorporated feedback and tuned performance.
Supported deployment on 10+ real-world test devices; collected 10,000+ samples for analysis.

experience.title: Problem Setter and Tester
highlights: Designed programming problems and curated edge-case test suites.
Tested solutions for correctness, time/space efficiency, and robustness.

experience.title: Team Member
highlights: Co-developed a Smart Geolocation Attendance System for efficient tracking.
Conducted research on geolocation-based solutions; addressed reliability constraints.
Experience in project development, research, and team collaboration under real-time constraints.

projects.title: Smart Detection App
projects.summary: Real-time face detection and analytics app using Flutter + CV + Deep Learning with a Python/FastAPI backend.
highlights: Integrated InsightFace and DeepFace CNNs for high-accuracy detection and feature extraction.
Used OpenCV for image preprocessing and camera input handling.
Tracked per-identity stats: estimated age, gender, race; time in frame; visit frequency.
Designed a backend with metadata logging for future analytics; addressed identity matching and reliability.

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis on Financial News
projects.summary: Classified financial news headlines into positive/negative/neutral using a BiLSTM built from scratch.
highlights: Used Financial PhraseBank (75%+ annotator agreement).
Custom preprocessing: tokenization, stop-word removal, padding sequences.
Trained/evaluated using TensorFlow/Keras with accuracy, precision, recall, F1.

projects.title: Stock Market Analysis Dashboard
projects.summary: Exploratory stock analysis with interactive visualizations for trends and technical indicators.
highlights: Line charts for price movement; bar charts for volume; moving averages; Bollinger Bands; RSI.
Correlation heatmap for relationships across multiple stocks using Pandas/NumPy.
Interactive plots built with Matplotlib/Plotly.

projects.title: Stock Price Prediction (LSTM)
projects.summary: Predicted future stock prices using a 60‑day lookback LSTM on historical data.
highlights: Used TensorFlow/Keras with feature scaling; fetched data via yfinance.
Evaluated with train/test split and plotted prediction vs actual using Matplotlib.
Libraries: NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, scikit-learn.

education.degree: B.Tech, Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
education.institution: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology
